title: Coronavirus: The month everything changed
description: In the space of a month, the United Kingdom has transformed beyond recognition.
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images/Alamy
In the space of a month, the United Kingdom has transformed beyond recognition. And most of us haven't had time to stop and take stock.
One Friday afternoon, when the UK was another country, a chalkboard leaned against the … [+10647 chars]
